message:
Strong Condemnation and Protest against the verdict of the Tribunal on Golam Azam case:

The people has rejected with severe abhorrence the ill-motivated ruling- Shibir

Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir strongly slated and protested against the unjust verdict of 90-year rigorous imprisonment for Professor Golam Azam, an eminent leader of global Islamic Movement, introducer of caretaker government system in Bangladesh, language movement soldier, Ex-GS of DUCSU, age-old politician and the Ex-Chief of Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami.

In a protest statement, the Secretary-General of Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir Abdul Jabbar said, “The people of Bangladesh are not at all at one with the politically-motivated verdict handed down by the farcical tribunal against Professor Golam Azam, a prominent Islamic thinker and distinguished leader of world Islamic Movement. The whole nation rejected with abhorrence this ill-motivated ruling which is vividly a part of the multi-
dimensional conspiracies framed against Islam and Islamic Movement in this country. The people are badly infuriated to
see Professor Golam Azam be punished with long 90-year rigorous imprisonment who is supposed to be set free unconditionally.”

Shibir Secretary-General urged the government to abolish the illegitimate tribunal and to release all the arrested Jamaat leaders without further delay.
